title: Angels Recording Names during Friday Prayers, what is the time for this
transcript: can from Nigeria during um Friday prayers and the Imam comes around um he says Salam then um the you know Mak calls there then Thea begins so my question now is um what um specific time does do the Angels you know stop recording the people came is it when the says Salam or after you know or when he begins the you know after no the moment the IM enters the Masid they close their books so immediately once he enters the Masjid and goes to the pulpit and says it's done and over with
